dmca.title: Google DMCA - Lance Hill
dmca.body:
Google Legal Support:

This letter is being sent as a notice of the copyright infringement of the website of The Southern Institute for Education and Research.

I. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.southerninstitute.info/contact_us/lance_bio.html. The copyrighted work at hand here is the photograph of Lance Hill which is located on this webpage.

II. The infringing material noted in the previous section is as follows:

The copyrighted picture of Lance Hill which appears on this website. Search Query: Lance Hill
Infringing Webpages: http://isurvived.org/TOC-V.html#Up. Also the webpage http://isurvived.org/Holocaust-LanceHill.html and the webpage http://isurvived.org/2Postings/Holocaust_trivialization.html uses the copyrighted photograph of Dr. Lance Hill without consent.

An open letter which is sent out by the Southern Institute for Education and Research. This open letter is sent to people who desired information and where on our mailing lists. The letter is copyrighted and was not produced without our consent.
Search Query: Lance Hill
Infringing Webpages: http://isurvived.org/2Postings/Holocaust_trivialization.html

III. [private]@tulane.edu or by phone at [private].

IV. [private]@isurvived.org

V. After researching and making several attempts to resolve the situation in other manners, I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

V. After researching and making several attempts to resolve the situation in other manners, I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

VI. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title
17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that
I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

VII. [private]
[signed]
dmca.principal_name: Southern Institute for Education and Research
